text: Thor, do you recommend this game? Yes.
And if so, would you pick it to me,
please? I've seen so much about this
game lately, but I'm still so unsure.
Okay, you want me to pitch it to you? It
is marketed as a turnbased game.
Turn-based RPG. None of this feels
combat. You have to parry, you have to
dodge, you have to jump, you have to
gradient parry, you have to read your
enemy, you have to learn them. It is a
absolutely wild. It's like Final Fantasy
and like a Dark Souls game.
